code: import api from'./api';export const authService={async login(email,password){const formData=new FormData();formData.append('username',email);formData.append('password',password);const response=await api.post('/auth/login',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});return response.data;},async register(userData){const response=await api.post('/auth/register',userData);return response.data;},async getCurrentUser(){const response=await api.get('/auth/me');return response.data;},async refreshToken(){const response=await api.post('/auth/refresh');return response.data;}};
